p: Glycosylation sites are defined by the motif N-X-T/S, where X is any amino acid except Proline. A position in a HA amino acid sequence is considered to be glycosylated if it contains the N-X-T/S motif and is predicted by GlyProt ( http://www.glycosciences.de/modeling/glyprot/php/main.php) â€“ an online tool for in silico glycosylation of proteins.
